amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force, up to $6,000,000 for Military-Standard-1760 integration for the internal weapons bays of B-52 aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4796 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4796 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S8590-8591; text: CR S8590) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force, up to $6,000,000 for Military-Standard-1760 integration for the internal weapons bays of B-52 aircraft.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4796 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4796 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Conrad.
